page.title: 13RANGER'S DAY IN EAST MERSEA
page.content: The Ranger has been at Cudmore Grove Country Park for two years. He lives in a newly built bungalow in the park's grounds. He also looks after a 100 hectare ancient coppice in Earls Colne. His work is varied and includes:_ Collecting litter from the park and beach every morning ; Repairing fences that are broken or have been vandalised ; Every 2 weeks he cuts the grass in the park ; Growing and selling hay which brings in much needed income ; Sometimes sea_erosion of the cliffs means he has to re_position the fence above them ; He also maintains equipment,paints signposts and periodically plants trees.
